resultSchema.label: Weather Parameters
resultSchema.description: Weather parameters measured by a static weather station

fields.name: temp
fields.label: Air Temperature
fields.description: The bulk temperature of air, measured 2 m above the ground, under shelter

fields.name: wind_speed
fields.label: Wind Speed
fields.description: The magnitude of the wind speed vector

fields.name: wind_dir
fields.label: Wind Direction
fields.description: The direction the wind is coming from, measured clockwise from north
